trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> types to UI Automation.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
Gets the access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.
The access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.MenuItem" /> enumeration value.
Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
The collection of child elements.
Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
A string that contains "MenuItem".
Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
The string that contains the label.
The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nome pode ser pensada como a cadeia de caracteres de texto que um usuário deseja usar para explicar o que controle se refere.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: É importante ter uma representação textual para todos os controles de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] para que você pode consultar programaticamente o controle de maneira localizada.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> object.
trans-unit.target: Se uma das seguintes situações ocorrer, esse método retorna atual <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> objeto.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> que é associada a essa <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> tem filho <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> does not have child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> que é associada a essa <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> não tem filho <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> que é associada a essa <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> tem sua propriedade selecionável definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Se `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput?displayProperty=nameWithType>, esse método retorna um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The state (expanded or collapsed) of the control.
trans-unit.target: O estado (expandidos ou recolhidos) do controle.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The toggle state of the control.
